For sale: All prices include shipping. Payment by paypal gift or money order or personal check. PM or email to [url]6drew@msn.com[/url] to reserve a card or cards. Feel free to make reasonable offers. Several more card from my personal collection will be surfacing soon for sale. Drew

PSA 2 T206 Harry Davis - Davis front Piedomnt 350-460 Factory 42 Back -  SOLD - Thanks Marty
